channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Kirill Gavrilyuk

item.title: Actor and Action Video Segmentation from a Sentence
item.description: Datasets A2D Sentences We have extended Actor and Action (A2D) Dataset with additional description of every object is doing in the videos. We provide three files containing our annotation: a2d_annotation.txt contains annotation in the format “video_id,instance_id,query” where: “video_id” - the original id of the video from the A2D dataset “instance_id” - the id of the object in the video that we have added to the original annotation

item.title: VideoLSTM convolves, attends and flows for action recognition
